snippet: Day 1 of the N.H.L. lockout came and went without any official announcement. Some players signed on to play in other leagues, as talks between the league and players remained stalled.
abstract: Day 1 of the NHL lockout comes and goes without any official announcement; some NHL players are already signing on to play in overseas leagues during the lockout.
lead_paragraph: Day 1 of the N.H.L. lockout came and went without any official announcement. Some players signed on to play in other leagues, as talks between the league and players remained stalled.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Lockout Comes As Some Players Go to Skate in European Leagues
headline.main: As N.H.L. Lockout Begins, So Does a Likely Exodus of Players to Europe
headline.print_headline: As N.H.L. Lockout Begins, So Does a Likely Exodus of Players to Europe
